actions.name: Protean

cost.trigger: The user declares its use of a Physical- or Special-Category attack.

actions.description:
Trigger: The user declares its use of a Physical- or Special-Category attack.

Effect: The user may change their Types to the Type of the triggering attack before the attack is initiated. The user remains as the triggering attack's Type for 5 Activations, or until switched out or @Affliction[fainted]. Protean can only be used once per combat.
